description: Erection of a single storey rear and a side infill extension; erection a side roof extension with one front and one rear roof window, installation of a juliet balcony and chimney  to rear elevation, new and replacement windows and doors and side gate to the house.
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Condition : 2 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 3 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Unnumbered Location Plan; Flood Risk Assessment; Design and Access Statement; 42 SUT /S301; 42 SUT /S301; 42 SUT /S300; 42 SUT /S100(2); 42 SUT /S100(1); 42 SUT /S102; 42 SUT /S101; 42 SUT /PL102; 42 SUT /PL100(2); 42 SUT /PL100(1); 42 SUT /PL101; 42 SUT /L100;                                      Received: 25 June 2020
Amended plans: 42 SUT /PL300A; 42 SUT /PL302(2)A; 42 SUT /PL301A; 42 SUT /PL302A;                  Received: 14 August 2020  ) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 4 - No demolition or construction work shall take place on the site except between the hours of 8:00am  to 6:00pm on Mondays to Friday and 9 :00am to 1:00pm on Saturdays and none shall take place on Sundays and Public Holidays without the prior agreement of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 5 - The windows formed in the side dormer on the southern elevation shall be obscure glazed, hinged to open inwards and shall not be repaired or replaced otherwise than with obscured glazing.
